name: The River Inside of Trees
blurb: Jazz lieder. Haiku. Wilderness. Trout. Quirky humor. Storybook innocence. Death & rebirth. 30 tracks, 32 mins, 1 album.

name: The Bluebelles
blurb: The Bluebelles are taking their debut show of jazz A Cappella to the Edinburgh Fringe Festival this summer, and need your help!

name: Maud Hixson Sings The Music of Michael Leonard CD
blurb: The first album devoted entirely to this composer's work, with pianist Tex Arnold, bassist Steve LaSpina, and trumpeter Warren Vaché.

name: Limited-Edition Vinyl: Award-Winning 'Twisted Soul'
blurb: Award-winning Jazz Pop album 'Twisted Soul!' Only 200 Kickstarter, Limited-Edition LPs to be pressed. All signed and numbered.

name: HELP MAKE TESSA SOUTER'S NEXT CD
blurb: An album tracing my musical DNA from Africa to the Caribbean, Andalusian Spain, Celtic Britain and the US. Read all about it below.

name: My Future Just Passed - Debut CD - Jazz Trio
blurb: New York based saxophonist Sam Taylor records his first album this December - a collection of songs inspired by his musical journey.

name: Jazz is Heaven
blurb: Nashville vocalist Lindsey Benedict is recording a jazz record & invites you to be a backer.  In return you'll receive a unique reward.

name: Kind of Bloop: An 8-Bit Tribute to Miles Davis
blurb: What would the pioneers of jazz sound like on a Nintendo Entertainment System?  Coltrane on a C-64? Mingus on Amiga?  For years...

name: EMILY ASHER'S GARDEN PARTY is Sprouting a New Album!
blurb: A fresh new tail shaking, joy waking, romance making, rule breaking, breath taking, Big Easy meets The Big Apple, Garden Party album.

name: The Better Angels of Our Nature - Recording Project
blurb: A modern jazz work exploring traditional songs from the American Civil War

name: 2016 Denver Jazz Trumpet Consortium Scholarships
blurb: Help fund the aspirations of jazz trumpeters.   Scholarships are needed by at least 50% of registrants.  We appreciate your support!

name: Sean Perrin "Dreamsongs"
blurb: "Dreamsongs" is an album that features the music of Chick Corea and Philip Glass arranged for clarinet and mallet percussion.

name: Newvelle Records: World-Class Music, Only on Vinyl
blurb: Newvelle Records is a new kind of record label with a curated selection of world class musicians, released only on vinyl.

name: Debra Mann "Full Circle" A CD of the music of Joni Mitchell
blurb: Help me create a beautiful new recording.   I am now reaching for my SECOND stretch goal!  Please, join me by becoming a backer today!

name: Marcelino Feliciano's Debut CD
blurb: Songs of love, loss and hope. Original compositions and standards that explore the beauty of life and fragility of love.

name: The Masters' Apprentice
blurb: The Masters’ Apprentice is a story of resilience—of enduring rejection, toil, and injury to create an album of amazing piano music.

name: "The Songs of The Rat Pack" CD / Album
blurb: Take "The Songs of The Rat Pack" home with you! I am recording a LIVE Album, featuring all of the timeless hits of Frank, Dean & Sammy!

name: Help me record my debut album : "The Beauty Of Differences"
blurb: What if listening to a jazz album would provide drinking water to the most vulnerable? Let's make this dream come true.

name: Left wing swing band Cats & Dinosaurs' new English album!
blurb: The world's most radical swing band is back to record our third full length album, this time all in English and on vinyl!

name: Qwest TV: Quincy Jones' new video-streaming service for jazz
blurb: The world’s first subscription video-on-demand (SVOD) platform dedicated to jazz and beyond, launching this fall. Join the Qwest!

name: ERIS 136199 tour+recording: Glorious Noise and Sweet Dreams
blurb: Han-earl Park, Nick Didkovsky and Catherine Sikora are bringing “a beautiful noise” to Europe, and recording their second album!

name: Life On Land - New Album by Jazz Pianist & Singer Joy Ellis
blurb: The first album I've made of completely original tunes. It reveals my love of jazz & groove music, steeped in the songwriter tradition.

name: Jazz: The George Kahn Trio with Alex Acuna, Lyman Medeiros
blurb: George Kahn's new album carries the Jazz Piano Trio tradition into the 21st Century.  Join us on the journey to complete this album

name: Anna Jalkéus Group Debut Album – Estrogenia
blurb: Swedish harp/voice jazz-fusion-avant-garde phenomenon Anna Jalkéus is bringing her band's debut album into the world – join the party!

name: Megan & her Goody Goodies Album Debut - Come & Get It Honey
blurb: Swing band Megan & her Goody Goodies are recording their debut album, Come and Get It Honey - Live at The Studio.

name: Back at the Roadhouse
blurb: This album is a return to my blues and soul roots fused with my passion for jazz.

name: Nomad - debut jazz funk/fusion album from Benjamin Harrison
blurb: A full length album two and a half years in the making featuring nine incredible musicians from around the world. Help me fund it!

name: Braids of Kabuya
blurb: A full-length album of contemporary harp music by the band, The Daphnes.

name: GREAT AUNT RUTH & THE SAUCY CATS
blurb:
PRE-SELL OUR FIRST EP
AND STEAL YOUR HEART

name: For The Love of Big Band - The Album
blurb: Creating a woman-led big band live recording, preserving the big band tradition, and supporting jazz gender justice.

name: BARDFLY: Songs from Shakespeare with a Jazz Twist
blurb:
New Album Production from Actor-Singer-Songwriter John Allee. "A modern-day troubadour." - American Songwriter Magazine

​

name: Anastasia Minster: Father
blurb: A new album by a singer and composer from Toronto who writes beautiful piano-driven songs in the style of noir chamber pop.

name: Irrationalities: Petros Klampanis' 4th album
blurb: Music for attentive listeners, created with passion, knowledge and lots of energy!

name: 13 Lunar Meditations: Summoning the Witches
blurb: A new album by Ayelet Rose Gottlieb featuring Jay Clayton, about the MOON. Composed to texts by female writers from around the globe

name: Emily Asher's Garden Party: Album Nuevo
blurb: A new album of hot jazz and songs inspired by the Southern Sun.

name: Eris 136199: effortlessly strange improvised music
blurb: A new recording of harmonious discord and mellismatic noise from this transatlantic trio of improvisers.

name: DreamCatcher: George Kahn Jazz Quartet
blurb: Be part of the creation of George Kahn's 10th jazz album, Jazz for Lovers and Dreamers featuring Pat Kelley, Alex Acuña, David Hughes

name: Pianist Tim Chernikoff's Debut Album: "Pieces of Sanity"
blurb: Help fund my debut full length studio album:  "Pieces of Sanity", with Jakob Dreyer bass and Kenneth Salters drums.

name: Baking Spirits Bright
blurb: The Debut Jazz Christmas Album from Candace Lynn Matthews

name: Uummat - an album by Kenneth Dahl Knudsen
blurb: Inspired by both mythical and quite real monsters, the record Uummat reflects experiences of Greenlandic island Uummannaq.

name: AMARELA ON VINYL!
blurb: WE DON'T NEED THEM FUCKING LABELS!

name: From Coltrane to Coal Train: An Eco-Jazz Suite
blurb: CD release featuring poetry by Marc Beaudin, music by Billy Conway, Dana Colley & Laurie Sargent.

name: IVORA: Billy Prim' 2nd Album
blurb: Music for attentive listeners, created with passion, love and lots of energy!!!

name: Take 2: Potluck Album Fundraiser
blurb: Dr. Daylight's Jazz Co. is raising funds for their 2nd studio album featuring guest vocalists

name: Soundtrack des Hörspiels „Der Krieg der Knöpfe“
blurb: Ein von der Jugendband BLACKDRUM selbstständig eingespielter Soundtrack zu dem neu entstandenen Hörspiel "Der Krieg der Knöpfe".

name: Love Stronger: Al Strong's Forthcoming Full Length Album
blurb: A collection of life stories set to music and supported by and All Star cast of captivating musicians

name: Song of Songs
blurb: A conceptual music album exploring the theme of love and featuring orchestral arrangements

name: The Oddisea Suite: a four-part concept album by Oddity
blurb:
Always chasing the sunset |
But never present enough to see it |
I blink and I've missed it...
[jazz/neo-soul/hip-hop]

name: Westbound Situation "Accord"
blurb: A new full length record from Westbound Situation!
